trigger.Name: cinStart
trigger.script:
PlayCustomMusic("Techno02") local Plf = GetPlayerVehicle() if Plf then Plf:SetCustomControlEnabled( true ) Plf:SetCustomLinearVelocity( 0 ) Plf:SetThrottle( 0 ) Plf:SetGamePositionOnGround(CVector(112.345, 256.000, 134.270)) Plf:SetRotation(Quaternion(0.007, 0.335, -0.010, -0.942)) Plf:SetCustomControlEnabled( false ) end
Fly("start01", CINEMATIC_NO_AIM, 0, 25, 1, 0 ) Fly("start02", CINEMATIC_NO_AIM, 0, 5, 0, 0 ) Fly("start03", CINEMATIC_NO_AIM, 0, 25, 0, 0 ) Fly("talkie_talkie", CINEMATIC_NO_AIM, 0, 79, 0, 1 ) StartCinematic() TActivate("talkie_fly") TActivate("dweller_spawn") TActivate("cinStart_end") trigger:Deactivate()

trigger.Name: dweller_spawn
trigger.script:
CreateNewDummyObject( "dweller_player", "Son", -1, -1, CVector(109.951, 255.000, 130.391), Quaternion(0.0000, -0.4325, 0.0000, 0.9016), 0) CreateNewDummyObject( "dweller", "Druid", -1, -1, CVector(107.827, 255.111, 132.116), Quaternion(-0.6881, -0.0179, -0.0191, 0.7251), 0)
getObj("Son"):SetNodeAction(AT_STAND1)

trigger.Name: talkie_fly
trigger.script:
AddCinematicMessage( 1, 0.5 ) AddCinematicMessage( 2, 0.5 ) AddCinematicMessage( 3, 0.5 ) AddCinematicMessage( 4, 0.5 ) AddCinematicMessage( 5, 0.5 ) AddCinematicMessage( 6, 0.5 ) AddCinematicMessage( 7, 0.5 ) AddCinematicMessage( 8, 0.5 ) AddCinematicMessage( 9, 0.5 ) AddCinematicMessage( 10, 0.5 ) AddCinematicMessage( 11, 0.5 )
trigger:Deactivate()

trigger.Name: cinStart_end
trigger.script:
TakeQuest("GenDestroy_Quest") SetCameraBehindPlayerVehicle() local sn = getObj("Son") local dr = getObj("Druid") if sn then sn:Remove() end if dr then dr:Remove() end TActivate("trAutoSave") StopPlayingCustomMusic()
trigger:Deactivate()

trigger.Name: trAutoSave
trigger.script:
if GetVar("AutoSaveCount").AsInt == 0 then SetVar("AutoSaveCount", 1) AutoSave(STR_CAVE) else AllowSave(false) end
trigger:Deactivate()

trigger.Name: cinGenDestroyedFly
trigger.script: local vh = GetPlayerVehicle() if vh then vh:SetCustomControlEnabled( true ) vh:SetThrottle( 0 ) vh:SetCustomLinearVelocity( 0 ) vh:SetCustomControlEnabled( false ) end TActivate("cinGenDestroyed") Fly("GateDestr", CINEMATIC_NO_AIM, 0, 8, 1, 1 ) StartCinematic() trigger:Deactivate()

trigger.Name: cinGenDestroyed
trigger.script:
local mplate1 = GetEntityByName("gt01") local mplate2 = GetEntityByName("gt02") local mplate3 = GetEntityByName("gt03") if mplate1 then mplate1:Remove() mplate2:Remove() mplate3:Remove() end
CreateEffectInsertedInRemove( "ET_PS_VEH_EXP1_MED1", CVector(223.666, 255.889, 353.379), Quaternion(0.0000, 0.0000, 0.0000, 1.0000), true ) trigger:Deactivate()
